title: Session 2 Review Transcript
text:
Guidance | The Biblical Word

 

In our Orientation Session, our Theme Word was Guidance and our Title was The Biblical Word.

 

We discussed the power and guidance Scripture can have in our lives, and that we can encounter the living God as we read it.

 

We are challenged to read the Scripture in the following way. We are to:

+ Read the Scripture using our minds, searching for meaning.

+ Look closely at context.

+ Read through the eyes of Jesus.

+ Pray for the guidance of the Holy Spirit.

 

The Mark of Discipleship is: Disciples place themselves under the power and guidance of Scripture.

 

 

Creation | The Creating God

 

Next, we began our study in the Book of Genesis with the Theme Word Creation and the Title: The Creating God.

 

We remember that unique to the Genesis story is that God created this amazing universe out of chaos using words alone. We studied the two creation stories and discussed the following ideas:

 

We are created in the image of God.

 

We are to be caretakers of the earth.

 

We are to observe the Sabbath.

 

The Mark of Discipleship is:  Disciples know they belong to God, that God has claim on them.

 

 

Today our Theme Word is Sin and our Title is The Rebel People.
